channel.title: How I add the use an item on object for this thing?
channel.description:
[code]} else if (UsedOnObjectID == 2452) { //air talisman altar if (ItemID == 1438) { teleportToX = 2845; teleportToY = 4832; sendMessage("The air talisman glows and you are teleported somewhere.."); }} else if (UsedOnObjectID == 2453) { //mind talisman altar if (ItemID == 1448) { teleportToX = 2791; teleportToY = 4832; sendMessage("The mind talisman glows and you are teleported somewhere.."); }} else if (UsedOnObjectID == 2454) { //water talisman altar if (ItemID == 1440) { teleportToX = 2721; teleportToY = 4833; sendMessage("The water talisman glows and you are teleported somewhere.."); }} else if (UsedOnObjectID == 2455) { //earth talisman altar if (ItemID == 1444) { teleportToX = 2664; teleportToY = 4836; sendMessage("The earth talisman glows and you are teleported somewhere.."); }} else if (UsedOnObjectID == 2456) { //fire talisman altar if (ItemID == 1442) { teleportToX = 2577; teleportToY = 4832; sendMessage("The fire talisman glows and you are teleported somewhere.."); }} else if (UsedOnObjectID == 2457) { //body talisman altar if (ItemID == 1446) { teleportToX = 2527; teleportToY = 4825; sendMessage("The body talisman glows and you are teleported somewhere.."); }} else if (UsedOnObjectID == 2458) { //cosmic talisman altar if (ItemID == 1454) { teleportToX = 2845; teleportToY = 4832; sendMessage("The cosmic talisman glows and you are teleported somewhere.."); }} else if (UsedOnObjectID == 2459) { //chaos talisman altar if (ItemID == 1452) { teleportToX = 2269; teleportToY = 4843; sendMessage("The chaos talisman glows and you are teleported somewhere.."); }} else if (UsedOnObjectID == 2460) { //nature talisman altar if (ItemID == 1462) { teleportToX = 2398; teleportToY = 4836; sendMessage("The nature talisman glows and you are teleported somewhere.."); }} else if (UsedOnObjectID == 2461) { //law talisman altar if (ItemID == 1458) { teleportToX = 2464; teleportToY = 4821; sendMessage("The law talisman glows and you are teleported somewhere.."); }[/code]
Well How Do I add that on use an item on object. *above* case 317?????????????

item.title: How I add the use an item on object for this thing?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I got the same problem, but I cracked mine down to 1 error. I can tell you something youre doing wrong.
1.Youre not press enter/leaving a big gap in between them (Its all one big line)
2.Youre not tabbing in between things
3.The VERY first } is not needed.
If you want my version of runecrafting (Type ::Tally, use a tally on an ess to get a rune), tell me on this and Ill make it into a tutorial on the tutorials section.

Read full topic
item.source: How I add the use an item on object for this thing?
